body.p: NOTE: This font is not ready for general use as it is being reviewed and corrected.
Oracc RSP is a fontification of A. Deimel, Liste der archaischen Keilschriftzeichen (WVDOG 40; Berlin 1922).
PNG files of individual RSP signs were excerpted from a scanned copy by Steve Tinney and converted to a font using the Santak toolkit..
Oracc RSP is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1.
All of the Oracc fonts are downloadable from the Oracc II GitHub repository in the msc/fonts subdirectory.
In Oracc projects the font is selected with the CSS class ofs-rsp.
